text: Ryszard Fudali (born 16 August 1971) is a retired Polish football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Hutnik Nowa Huta players Category:Śląsk Wrocław players Category:KS Cracovia players Category:Stal Stalowa Wola players Category:Proszowianka Proszowice players Category:Association football defenders
title: Ryszard Fudali
